contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 23, 2003 D GBBA Own Choice (Fourth Section)
GBBA Own Choice (Fourth Section) 240 Own Choice Test Piece Contest GBBA Own Choice Contest gbba-own-choice-fourth-section
Royal Forest of Dean College, Berry Hill Chalford Academy were drawn 8 out of 9 in the Fourth Section and were placed 5th in the March and 6th on the test piece.
4th Section: Pillowell Silver (conducted by Brian Howard) won the March with Parkend and Berry Hill won the test piece.
Pillowell also won the best trombone section and Phoenix Brass euphonium won best instrumentalist.
April 18, 2015, 11:52 a.m. April 18, 2015, 11:54 a.m.
1 Berry Hill Silver Unknown
2 Winchcombe Concert Brass Andrew Davidson
3 Phoenix Brass [Froxfield] David Watson
6 Chalford Academy Unknown
Unknown Result Pillowell Silver Band Brian Howard
